title: Let’s Deepen Our Friendship!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Mia-chan. I wanted to become better friends with you, so I got you a present.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>......? We’re already good friends, though?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That’s true! But I want to deepen our friendship even more!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Sure, I guess......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Let’s eat this together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What is this...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>A rice burger!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>No thanks. That’s totally wrong. The buns shouldn’t be made with rice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>But, but! Hamburg steaks are delicious, too, right? You probably didn’t think that they’d be good at first... Please... Just one bite......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Huh~...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Please, Mia-chan......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I guess it can’t be helped. I’ll have one bite... Nom......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>...What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I guess I can eat the rest of it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hooray!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
